vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.14;
son of: Othniel (H6274)(?) whose wife was Achsah (H5915);
brother of: Hathath (H2867)(?);
father of: Ophrah (H6084I)
§ Meonothai = "my habitations"
a son of Othniel, the younger brother of Caleb
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Otoniel; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
憫挪太 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "我的住所"
俄陀聶的兒子, 迦勒的弟弟(代上 4:14)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
悯挪太 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "我的住所"
俄陀聂的儿子, 迦勒的弟弟(代上 4:14)
